markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Oddity Identification](/Feats.aspx?ID=817) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 264 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)

</column>

---

You have a sense for spells that twist minds or reveal secrets. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Occultism checks to Identify Magic with the mental, possession, prediction, or scrying traits.
name: Oddity Identification
